content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetPops path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/pops content: sum get points of presence
desc get the stackpath cdns points of presence
responses
200
cdngetpopsresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type arr
cdnpop
type obj
props
code
type str
desc a stackpath pops iata formatted location code
name
type str
desc a stackpath pops name
latitude
type num
format float
desc a stackpath pops latitude coordinates
longitude
type num
format float
desc a stackpath pops longitude coordinates
desc a point of presence responsible for serving content to a geographic location

pops contain edge nodes responsible for cdn waf monitoring and all other stackpath product offerings
desc the requested stackpath points of presence
desc the response from a request to retrieve the stackpaths points of presence
title: 10_Infrastructure_GetPops_60.json
